Uses of Package
info.jonclark.treegraft.core.rules

Packages that use info.jonclark.treegraft.core.rules
info.jonclark.treegraft.chartparser A stochastic transduction chart parser. 
info.jonclark.treegraft.core Core classes that can be shared between various parsers and NLP tools. 
info.jonclark.treegraft.core.formatting.forest Handles the tranformation of Charts into parse forests or hypergraphs. 
info.jonclark.treegraft.core.formatting.parses Transforms parses into strings including such transformations as transduction from source to target languages. 
info.jonclark.treegraft.core.rules Various types of grammar rules (e.g. 
 

Classes in info.jonclark.treegraft.core.rules used by info.jonclark.treegraft.chartparser
GrammarRule
          A basic grammar rule for a monolingual or transduction parser.
RuleFactory
          A means for handling on-the-fly creation of dummy rules for terminal symbols during the parsing process and for defining how partial parse output should be formatted for use in debugging.
 

Classes in info.jonclark.treegraft.core.rules used by info.jonclark.treegraft.core
GrammarRule
          A basic grammar rule for a monolingual or transduction parser.
MonoCFGRule
          A monolingual version of a Context-Free GrammarRule.
SyncCFGRule
          A synchronous version of a Context-Free GrammarRule.
 

Classes in info.jonclark.treegraft.core.rules used by info.jonclark.treegraft.core.formatting.forest

          A basic grammar rule for a monolingual or transduction parser.
